name: Skillspad
description: You are a robot, your manufacturer has given you the mission to enter the facilities of the competition to see what they are manufacturing. You have found what you were looking for, a one button controller that gives you random abilities. The security systems have detected you and the facilities have turned into a maze with detector drones. Use the one button controller to deal with the drones and find the exit before it's too late. GL HF!
